Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 176th overall pick, by New York (A) in 2005...
Injured on 6/15/2010 with a Blister On Finger, out for one week...
Traded from New York (A) to San Diego on 5/23/2011 (Going to NYA: RF D. Vettleson, P J. Odorizzi. Going to SDN: P R. Porcello, P H. Brown, 2B M. Quintana)...
Injured on 5/20/2013 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
Earned first career win on 8/20/2016...
Had first career hit on 9/18/2016, off Dustin McGowan (LAN)...
Injured on 5/12/2018 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/29/2018 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from San Diego to Kansas City on 4/12/2019 (Going to SDN: P L. Arter. Going to KCA: P H. Brown)...
Injured on 7/29/2020 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/17/2023 to a 2-year deal worth $350,000 per year...
